description: Returns information about the specified flow definition.

parameters.name: FlowDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the flow definition.

nested_items.name: FlowDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow defintion.

nested_items.name: FlowDefinitionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow definition.

nested_items.name: FlowDefinitionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the flow definition. Valid values are listed below.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the flow definition was created.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopRequestSource
nested_items.description: Container for configuring the source of human task requests. Used to specify if Amazon Rekognition or Amazon Textract is used as an integration source.

nested_items.name: AwsManagedHumanLoopRequestSource
nested_items.description: Specifies whether Amazon Rekognition or Amazon Textract are used as the integration source. The default field settings and JSON parsing rules are different based on the integration source. Valid values:

nested_items.name: HumanLoopActivationConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about what triggers a human review workflow.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopActivationConditionsConfig
nested_items.description: Container structure for defining under what conditions SageMaker creates a human loop.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopActivationConditions
nested_items.description: JSON expressing use-case specific conditions declaratively. If any condition is matched, atomic tasks are created against the configured work team. The set of conditions is different for Rekognition and Textract. For more information about how to structure the JSON, see JSON Schema for Human Loop Activation Conditions in Amazon Augmented AI in the Amazon SageMaker Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about who works on the task, the workforce task price, and other task details.

nested_items.name: WorkteamArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a team of workers. To learn more about the types of workforces and work teams you can create and use with Amazon A2I, see Create and Manage Workforces.

nested_items.name: HumanTaskUiArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the human task user interface.

nested_items.name: TaskTitle
nested_items.description: A title for the human worker task.

nested_items.name: TaskDescription
nested_items.description: A description for the human worker task.

nested_items.name: TaskCount
nested_items.description: The number of distinct workers who will perform the same task on each object. For example, if TaskCount is set to 3 for an image classification labeling job, three workers will classify each input image. Increasing TaskCount can improve label accuracy.

nested_items.name: TaskAvailabilityLifetimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The length of time that a task remains available for review by human workers.

nested_items.name: TaskTimeLimitInSeconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time that a worker has to complete a task. The default value is 3,600 seconds (1 hour).

nested_items.name: TaskKeywords
nested_items.description: Keywords used to describe the task so that workers can discover the task.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: PublicWorkforceTaskPrice
nested_items.description: Defines the amount of money paid to an Amazon Mechanical Turk worker for each task performed.

nested_items.name: OutputConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the output file.

nested_items.name: S3OutputPath
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 path where the object containing human output will be made available.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Key Management Service (KMS) key ID for server-side encryption.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) execution role for the flow definition.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason your flow definition failed.
